conversations.content: I need to create an agent to handle customer support queries across multiple channels

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732119200000_k3l4m5n6o", "workspaceId": "ws_1732119200000_n5o6p7q8r", "sessionDescription": "Creating support agent", "sessionMemory": "Previously reviewed 23 support ticket examples. Customer feedback indicates 15% improvement needed in response times. Setting up intelligent routing system to distribute inquiries across three channels: email, chat, and helpdesk.", "toolContext": "Creating agent to automate customer inquiry handling, which enables rapid response and reduces manual routing overhead while maintaining quality standards", "primaryGoal": "Build customer support infrastructure", "subgoal": "Create intelligent support agent for multi-channel queries"}, "name": "customer-support", "description": "Handles customer inquiries and support tickets", "prompt": "Assist customers with questions, troubleshoot issues, and escalate complex problems"}

### Features
